_header: Ivy is both fair and green
_description: A carol in praise of ivy — five 7-line stanzas (ababccc) including bob and burden: ‘Ivy ys good & glad to se / Iuy is fair in hys degre’

BLEge3307.First Lines:
Iuy is both fair & grenin wynter & in somer
                    also…
BLEge3307.Last Lines:
…I kan tel no caus qwyBot we must loue that gentyll
                    tre
